bio: We're the largest web3 community and podcast in Mexico. We've been producing educational content since December 2020.
contributionDescription:
Here are some activities we delivered outside of the scope of the mission we presented and of Retro PGF2: 
We gave grants for 3 people to assist Permissionless, we paid for the accommodation and the conference tickets. In total, the grants represented more than $4,000 USD
We provided scholarships for 7 devs to take a Development bootcamp with LeWagon; in total, there were more than $16,000 USD in scholarships
We've produced more than 50 episodes since we received the last RetroPGF
We released a specific episode to discuss a report we created about Optimism. The report was part of the mission, but the podcast episode was not part of the scope 
We've produced more than 45 newsletters with diverse educational content; 
We have invested more than 20,000 USD in educational content

contributionLinks.description: Grants we gave people to assist to Permissionless
Telegram survey on how Espacio Cripto helped the community understand Optimism

impactDescription:
Some examples of how Espacio Cripto has helped the Optimistic vision:
Web3 name: brichis, Optimism Delegate
EC has been instrumental in my journey, offering me a platform to inspire others. Here, I learned that success isn't about bull markets; it's about building for the future #WinandHelpWin
Web3 name: Chuy García, Dappnode community manager
EC kickstarted communities nationwide by establishing the free sharing of knowledge as a core value in its own community. Most of us Mexicans in the ecosystem are here, in one way or another, thanks to Espacio Cripto.
Web3 name: AnaTech, Community manager @ Arbitrum Foundation
EC was my starting point, where I found many friends and opportunities. At Espacio Cripto, I continued to share, learn, and gain new abilities and friends.

fundingSources.description: Rewarded for our work up until then
Mission:Let’s take the Optimistic Vision to LATAM with EC. locked tokens

pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, Content Creation, Education, Web3 Community Platform, Media Production
